data.text: @VivekSi82138052 @nid_rockz Don't let the word "cheap" trigger you and also, appreciate the non-sensical comparison between the lowest jockey range and possibly highest MC products (selling @ -50% year round), well thought out and researched here but you lack vision for the bigger picture bud.

@bakri702 @nid_rockz Ohh then vedant fashion ( manyavar sherwani ) is essential , jockey sells low mrp products between 100 to 500 and Monte carlo jackets ranges are Above 5000 and u are saying cheap general product's , think and research first before writing anything ,
@VivekSi82138052 @nid_rockz Might be a good low PE bet but doesn't make it as good as Page industries. It's essentials (jockey, speedo) vs cheap general apparel.
